title: Building diverse friendships across community
content:
Scenario: Building diverse friendships across community
    Given Jordan's social circle includes both IDD and non-IDD people
    And diverse friendships enrich Jordan's life
    When Jordan participates in mixed-ability social activities
    Then the personal_agent supports social coordination
    And friends engage with Jordan as a peer, not a project
    And Jordan contributes to friendships through presence, joy, and care
    And relationships are genuine and reciprocal
    And Jordan experiences belonging in diverse community
    And Jordan's social connections are honored and supported
